name: ServiceNowCares
0:
”Alexa, open service now cares”
”Alexa, start service now cares”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: service now cares
des:
Healthcare requires technology to align around the patient in order to deliver great experiences and drive better outcomes and treatment. A ‘whole company approach’ is necessary to rebuild and reshape these experiences and meet patients seamlessly at every touchpoint.
As part of this patient-centric philosophy, Service Now will enable healthcare organizations to increase digital engagement with more efficient operations at every level by taking the friction out of interactions to unlock productivity.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
